name: Cosmos: Stella Returns
description:
Cosmos: Stella Returns is the sequel to Cosmos Bit. At last more of Cosmos' lore is revealed thanks to a new story and improved graphics. Furthermore, the space warrior Stella Mironova can sport new moves and accessories to prevail in this new adventure.
As its predecessor, Cosmos: Stella Returns offers retro looks and gameplay, adapting its difficulty to both veterans of the genre and the less experienced players.




  • New 90s pixel art graphic style!
  • New accessories to discover!
  • A new star-collection system to improve your equipment!
  • A tribute to the Metroidvania genre!
  • Retrogaming pixel art style!
  • 7 fearsome alien bosses!
  • 10 extra space cards to be found!
  • High level Synth Wave soundtrack signed by Jake D. Bind!
  • Collect minerals and develop your skills!
  • Unlock new skills in order to get stronger!
  • Wide variety of monsters and environments!
  • The challenge level is high but not frustrating!
  • Lots of Achievements to unlock!
